entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ## System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations Extensions https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/82311 #83797
  • Loading assemblies with invalid metadata keeps their file open. #83796
  • [wasm] Failures in System.Numerics.Vectors and System.Runtime.Intrinsics tests #83792
    8.0.0
  • Static executable on Alpine Linux published with gcc is failing #83791
  • [browser] Error on HttpClient.GetAsync for multithread WebAssembly browser app #83790
    8.0.0
  • [QUIC] Alpine packaging #83789
  • Blazor WASM closes/chrashes when starting debugging session with breakpoints #83785
  • JIT: OSR is not conservative enough about exposing struct locals #83783
  • Update MsQuic version in helix docker images #83782
    8.0.0
  • Alt-Svc header parser doesn't accept empty ALPN #83775
  • P/Invoke calls terminate application after unmanaged library modification (macOS, Arm64) #83774
  • [ARM64] Consecutive loads or stores not coalesced for vector operands #83773
    8.0.0
  • JsonObject constructor incorrect options behavior for JsonNodeOptions: PropertyNameCaseInsensitive #83766
  • .NET SDK uses wrong libc name on musl libc #83779
  • Microsoft.XmlSerializer.Generator not working with any .NET Standard 2.0 library #83765
  • [globalization] Get CultureInfo.NumberFormat may throw IndexOutOfRangeException #83764
    Future
  • [wasm] wasm-experimental: dotnet publish with output directory doesn't put the AppBundle in the output directory #83760

Closed

  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0046\\istype\\istype.cmd #78500
  • Enable 512-bit SIMD types in .NET Runtime and JIT #80810
    8.0.0
  • CI build failure in Linux Arm64: Generating native code, crossgen2.ilc.rsp exited with code 139 (segmentation fault) #76905
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\0582\\csgen.1\\csgen.1.cmd #78002
  • runtime-coreclr pgostress: failures with synthetic PGO #83674
    8.0.0
  • [EmailAddress] DataAnnotations not work correctly with user@example without .com #83451
  • [API Proposal]: Add global JsonSerializerOptions to System.Net.Http.Json #83767
  • [API Proposal]: Overwrite MemoryStream #83668
  • EmbeddedResource .so file can not found by GetManifestResourceNames #83763
  • Implement permanent solution to integrate simd64 type to VecCon node #82312
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_61104\\test61104\\test61104.cmd #77535
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_49982\\test49982\\test49982.cmd #77250
  • Test failure JIT/Stress/ABI/pinvokes_d/pinvokes_d.sh #77145
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle fileHandle) #79187
    8.0.0
  • dotnet test crashes - Win7 + .NET 7 - Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000E #78277
  • [Mono] linux-arm64 System.Numerics.Vector.Tests assertion: wrong maximal instruction length of instruction storex_membase (expected 12, got 16) #83780
    8.0.0
  • File.WriteAllText with Invalid File Name Chars in path writes 0 bytes and continues silently without exception #83778
  • Zero-lifetime HTTP pool can sometimes reuse connections #81494
  • [mono][jit] OP_STOREX_MEMBASE can exceed maximum expected length on arm64 #83769
    8.0.0
  • NetworkInformationException when querying network interfaces in WSL 1 #75883
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • [Draft] Backport template #83795
  • Temporary workaround for #83792 #83794
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [PERF] Re-label MonoAot LLVM=False to LLVM=True #83793
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Stop displaying missing info in replay runs #83788
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upload buildlogs with an _Attempt suffix #83786
    area-Meta
  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.TryWriteUtf8 #83761
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] More accurate jiterpreter cfg size estimation; generate smaller dispatch tables #83759
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono

Merged

  • [release/8.0-preview3] [browser] partial reversal of PR #82826 #83750
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove another reference field from async state machines #83737
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 8.0.0
  • Remove now unnecessary IsKnownConstant special-casing in interpolated string handlers #83762
  • Force ASM compiler to target the same triple as C, in WASI build #83787
    area-Build-mono
  • Fixes #79187 Add MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile(SafeFileHandle) overload #83134
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: tolerate malformed IL when counting block successors #83676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update owners and fabricbot #83732
    area-Meta
  • Move optimize bools pass to a new file #83768
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Increased max length of OP_STOREX_MEMBASE to 16 on arm64. #83770
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Reduce size of async state machine by a reference field #83696
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Add overload for EventSource primitives #83751
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add vectorization to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Adjust Test Watcher Timeout for Test Collections #83746
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add Symbolication to XUnitLogChecker #83702
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Futher cleanups to delegate invocation #83705
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Only call base.DisposeAsync on classes derived from FileStream #82874
    area-System.IO
  • Append leftovers of FromBase64Transform's input buffer to the transform buffer #82148
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm] Do not run embuilder minimal build #83475
    area-Build-mono
  • When the aggressive GCCollectionMode is specified, make sure the compacting parameter is set appropriately #83708
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LSRA TP]: Skip free heuristics if no free registers are available #83569
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX support by default #83648
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added floor and ceiling intrinsics for `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Vector128` and `System.Numerics.Vector` #83592
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-vm and other directories in coreclr #82381
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Make area-owners.json true source for all area like labels dependencies #82534
    no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • [QUIC] Fix failing parallel tests #83687
    area-System.Net
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Unroll Buffer.Memmove for arm64 #83740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Prototype a generalized promotion pass #83388
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Drop extra files from ReferenceCopyLocalPaths #83670
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Allow multiple EventCounters sessions and make sure EventListeners always send a Disable command #82970
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-pal and coreclr-debug directories #82380
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/7.0] Default media type used when 'null' is passed to StringContent #81506 #83425
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, regression-from-last-release, 7.0.x
  • [7.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83747
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • [6.0] Avoid using spanish helix queues #83748
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83743
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] SyntaxValueProvider: avoid performance issue with syntax list containing many items #83742
    area-Extensions-Logging

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, Wasm] Cannot marshal struct containing an array #2234
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM, Wasm] Cannot marshal multiple arrays by reference #2233

PullRequests

Merged

  • Create Microsoft.DotNet.ILCompiler.LLVM.props #2203
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Pass structs by reference in accordance with the WASM C ABI #2220
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Save EMCC linker parameters to RSP file #2209
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Export symbols on Emscripten #2232
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix warnings and use LLVM helpers for EH dispatchers #2226
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement basic debug info support for types and variables #2229
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Disclosed vulnerability in dotnet 6.0: GHSA-5crp-9r3c-p9vr (Newtonsoft.Json) #31382
  • Solution builds fine in Visual Studio but remote build failing in Azure DevOps failing with 'Error MSB406' #31380
  • too many same/different aspnetcore templates #31367
  • [preview][tizen] 8 and 7 both preview build tizen not works #31366
  • dotnet test exit with code 2 when test run aborted #31364

Closed

  • Long delay or hang at restore #31374
  • Build failed after upgrade to .Net 8.0 Preview 2.23153.2 and Visual Studio 2022 Professional 17.5.2 #31295

PullRequests

Created

  • Make SdkFeatureBand internal (sometimes) #31388
  • Reenable a skipped cppcli test. #31386
    untriaged
  • Add archived feeds #31383
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • Fix typo in AliasAssignmentCoordinator.cs #30553
  • Issue: 31133 backport pr 30762 to release/7.0.3xx: --platform #31319
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding Roslyn IDE as code owners #31020
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only enable scoped CSS when using Razor SDK #31359
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Fix a typo #26244
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in MSDeploy.cs #24271
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
  • Support for DisableDiagnosticTracing to suppress TRACE #22883
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31343
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetImportScopes returns 0 scope at leading trivia attached to EOF #67447
  • Feature 'Semantic classification' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #67442
  • Tracking item for IDE experience changes around source generators. #67441
  • Rewrite 'simplify type names' analyzer to use modern patterns for performance. #67439
    17.7
  • `using static` doesn't work for extension methods #67438
  • A possible ref safety "hole" around UnscopedRef method invoked on an expression classified as a value of a struct type #67435
    17.6
  • Remove optional parameters from IDiagnosticAnalyzerService #67434

Closed

  • Assert compiling dotnet/runtime in EmitConversions #67041
    17.6
  • True-negative in GetUsedAssemblyReferences #66188
    17.6
  • Please stop changing automatic bracket completion #67440
  • 'Change signature' preview reference changes doesn't work #62825
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] Roslyn source generator is not run during .NET Hot Reload, triggers rude edit when x:Name is changed #67428

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Building, Debugging, Testing instructions for VS #67451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove synchronous fire-and-forget mutation apis from TestWorkspace #67450
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add test for GetImportScopes #67446
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Checking escape characters when classification virtual character sequence #67444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support in LSP code for hosting workspaces that don't keep an independent view of the current solution. #67443
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Update assert in EmitConversion to allow for pointer subtraction #67445
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Document handling on unused imports by GetUsedAssemblyReferences API. #67437
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Implement LSP inlay hints #67319
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67431
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove abstract method that always returns the same value #67427
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use VS specific completion kinds in core LSP protocol layer #67419
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Exclude non-local diagnostics by default in legacy test framework for analyzer/code fix unit tests #67351
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enum base list completions #67396
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement Required Members for VB #66084
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Parser semicolon in initializer expression error handling #65256
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Clarify diagnostic when constant pattern has non-constant conversion to input type #64741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix unimported completions show in places where they should not be #67283
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2140648 #67418
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Track state table removal due to input separately from removal due to selection #66643
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Run analyzers only for requested span #67236
    Area-Analyzers
  • Preserve parent hoisted variables in nested async `catch` #67122
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ignore file-local source declarations when searching for well-known types #67183
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #47376
  • ActionMethod URL generation creates invalid URLs when POST action has a different route template #47375
  • Remove Razor SDK dependency in StaticWebAssets SDK #47374
    8.0-preview4
  • Add DefaultPooledObjectPolicy<T>.Instance #47372
  • OnStarting cannot be set because the response has already started. #47371
  • In .Net 7 attempting to Get a configuration section using a type defined as a record will duplicate array values. #47369
  • [Upgrade to .Net7] `SecurityStampValidator<TUser>` forces signout of `TwoFactorRememberMeScheme` which leads to InvalidOperationException in case scheme is not registered #47368
  • Provide a way to debug HTTP Response headers #47366
    Backlog
  • Adding custom events does not work as expected in Blazor, in .NET 7 and 8 #47363
  • Gets the authorization attribute that has a higher priority on the Action #47361
  • React to RDG name change in SDK for preview4 #47359
    8.0-preview4

Closed

  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, mvc #47355
  • Perf improvement: json #47362
  • Static web assets SDK depends on targets defined in Razor SDK #47314
    8.0-preview4
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Authorization Unable to compile #47205
    Backlog
  • HttpRequestJsonExtensions ReadFromJsonAsync can only be used once #47350
  • Remove duplicate tests from RDFTests for testing array binding support #47245
    8.0-preview4
  • Http chunk encoding miss end of chunked encoding("0\r\n") or tailer("\r\n") on IIS 7.5 #47364
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #47283
  • RDF/RDG inconsistency when resolving query/route parameters. #47353
    8.0-preview4
  • APP_POOL_ID environmental variable is null before app.Run() runs for some time. #47093
  • Update the documentation about the templates on learn.microsoft.com for .NET 7 #44712

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate some tests and fix fallback for empty optional bodies #47377
    area-runtime
  • Run Mvc.Razor.HelperResult callbacks inline #47373
    area-mvc
  • Resolve parent cultures via parent property instead of string process… #47365
    area-mvc, area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • Move RDFTests to shared RDG/RDF test infra (batch 2) #47360
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.4.23171.22 #47358
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Skip dotnet-install #40551
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix sending to another client from OnConnectedAsync #47204
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47162
    Servicing-approved, area-grpc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Improve Win bundle installers' UI #45935
    area-infrastructure, feature-installers, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView scrollts content behind TitleBar (can't scroll down enough) on some devices #14149
  • Wrong DisplayName and EnglishName in CultureInfo on iOS #14148
  • unexpected platformView for grid layout #14144
  • Blazor Hybrid Windows: Window was already activated when minimize and restore from taskbar #14142
    .NET 8 Planning
  • In .Net MAUI a container is wrong resized on iOS, when an image with AspectFit is inside #14139
    Backlog
  • TextToSpeech #14130
  • Android.Util.AndroidRuntimeException: Only the original thread that created a view hierarchy can touch its views. #14128
    Backlog
  • Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14125
    Backlog
  • On iOS Property InputTransparent=true does not work for LABEL #14124
    Backlog
  • Ability to raise soft keyboard regardless of HID connected to the tablet/phone on ios+android #14123
    Backlog
  • Activity Indicator and Absolute Layout issue #14120
    Backlog
  • Image list not growing when new items added #14118
    Backlog

Closed

  • Wrong height for Label placed inside a Scrollview #13498
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid macOS does not react to [Tab] [Up] [Enter] keys etc. #12244
    8.0-preview4
  • Keyboard Events Not Triggering in Input Element and InputText Component on macOS #14099
  • Maui Blazor Publish Issue #13279
  • Shadow not displaying properly in Border #13944
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI Throws Exception w/ Lib C#/WinRT #4039
    Backlog
  • [Android] SwipeItemView size issues #13547
    Backlog
  • [Android][Mac Catalyst] ScrollView with Orientation Both cannot scroll both directions (missing scrollbar) #13187
    Backlog
  • Android emulation not working on Mac - error XA0010: Could not retrieve the Android ABI for the attached device or emulator. #8639
  • Border does not change rendering when modifying StrokeShape properties #13988
    Backlog
  • CornerRadius on Border in .net 7 #13699
    Backlog
  • ScrollView inside border is not working in Mac and iOS #8923
    Backlog
  • canvas.DrawImage from originally CVPixelBuffer is not visible #14034
  • Setting SearchBar CancelButtonColor doesn't work on Windows #13507
    Backlog
  • [Android] Dynamically changing SwipeView margins is not updating the SwipeItems #4121
    Backlog
  • DisplayActionSheet still not working on Windows #14098
  • Could not load file or assembly XmlSerializers.dll on Mac #14086
  • RadioButton - Color of dot/glyph/indicator not changing #13670
    Backlog
  • Taking photos #14113
  • [MAC] Application crashes when interacting with Entry control #13931

PullRequests

Created

  • Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14150
  • Revert "Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property (#7442)" #14147
  • [android] update AOT profile for .NET 8 #14146
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [iOS] Don't set constraints for orientation if they are 0 #14143
    area/layout 🔲
  • [ios] cleanup Loaded/Unloaded observers #14140
  • Fix OnBackButtonPressed on iOS (#8296) #14137
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • RadioButton Default Template Fill Theme Fix and new Theme Colors for Samples app #14117
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton

Merged

  • [net8.0] Merge main net8 #14126
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix window life cycle calls on tests #14138
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    t/breaking 💥, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 8 Planning
  • [net8] Bump to latest .NET 8 Preview 3 builds #14131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview2] [CI] Fix the generated rollback files. #14141
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [CI] Fix the generated rollback files. #14127
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Shadow positions issues #13959
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext to Border StrokeShape #13793
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Don't apply mask to UIScrollView so the content doesn't get masked out #14096
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix edge case with Grids, *s, and unconstrained layouts #14114
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • Ensure an exact measure for the nested horizontal scrollview #13554
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fixed SwipeItems size dynamically changing the Content Margin #13501
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #14112
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Fix iOS and Android versions #14102
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [ios] fix memory leak with `Page` + `Layout` #14108
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13703
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Essentials] Remove lock from SecureStorage #13940
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Do not scroll for UIAlertControllers #14100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Add Pages VC View opposed to the handlers view #13510
  • Run templates on Android and iOS #13662

  • [net7.0] Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #14020

  • [net6.0] Updating Microsoft.Windows.SDK.BuildTools to 10.0.22621.756 #14106

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Look into EF's story with the Polly resilience framework #30552
  • Many-to-many using a JSON array column #30551
    Backlog
  • RowLimitingOperationWithoutOrderByWarning false positive #30550
  • SQL Server: how to config HasFillFactor on a string primary key #30549
  • Simple migration apparently completed, but prompt in Package Manager Control not restored #30548
  • Add-Migration is not recognized in Package Manager unless two instances of the Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design package are installed. #30547
  • Error when connect database transient failure in Visual Studio 2022 #30546
  • Generated SQL add extra precision to decimal constant without precision #30545

Closed

  • Sorting by a bigint / long in descending order times out on Linux, WSL, and MacOS #30544
  • add-migration to detect tabs/spaces preference from .editorconfig #30527
  • HasConversion with ForeignKey breaks the model #30518
  • Cannot find module './en.js' ; Zone: <root> ; Task: Promise.then ; Value: Error: Cannot find module './en.js' #30499

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.4.23171.22 #30543

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • During installation of SDK 8.0 P2, workload baseline manifests are still P1 #15804

PullRequests

Created

  • Change property name #15907
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15902

Merged

  • update installer table for 8 0 preview 3 #15896
  • Update SB version info for 8.0 Preview 2 release #15889
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15890

Updated

  • Shutdown the build server before each build. #15894
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Backport: Shutdown build servers for each SB repo project #15755
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Add source-build online stage2 CI leg #15870
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Assume recursive installer sync when no `vmr-sync.sh` arguments #15854
    Area-SourceBuild
  • Clean n-1 SBRP packages after building SBRP #15898
    Area-SourceBuild
